cookie.message: This website uses cookies to ensure you get the best experience on our website.

About.MainGoal: Main goal of the project is to present the data from a different angle. See the trends and compare situation of other countries and regions.
About.DataCredit: Data acquired thanks to Center for Systems Science and Engineering (CSSE) at Johns Hopkins University, and aggregated from number of sources.

tags.keywords: coronavirus, Covid-19, Covid, daily cases, daily deaths, statistics
tags.description: Statistics, graphs, and data tables, total number of cases, cases per day, recovered and deaths. Look for the trends and compare situation of other countries and regions.
